author: A_Brickset_user
title: Cool and very stable
review:
My 5 year old son, spent his pocket money for this model. With some little hints, he was able to build it alone. The realy big and bumpy wheels work like shock absorbers. Because of this wheels and the two technic bricks in the chassis the car is very stable. 
The pullback motor is very powerfull and the possibility to start the car on its back wheels is a fine gimmick.
